function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased movement of wildlife in human-dominated areas","Impact":"Potential spread of zoonotic diseases from wildlife to humans","Mitigation":"Restrict access to human-dominated areas to prevent contact between wildlife and human populations","Technologies":"Geofencing, sensor-based wildlife monitoring systems","People":"Residential and urban populations, wildlife researchers","Owner":"Local authorities, wildlife conservation organizations"},{"Description":"Reduction in human activity leading to wildlife encroachment","Impact":"Potential increase in human-wildlife conflicts and disease transmission","Mitigation":"Implementation of wildlife corridors and habitat restoration to redirect wildlife away from human-populated areas","Technologies":"Remote sensing, GPS tracking, wildlife monitoring apps","People":"Local communities, wildlife authorities","Owner":"Wildlife conservation organizations, local governments"},{"Description":"Reduced traffic leading to lower road kill cases","Impact":"Decreased mortality of wildlife due to road accidents","Mitigation":"Implementation of wildlife crossings, speed reduction measures, and road signage to alert drivers of wildlife presence","Technologies":"Wildlife detection systems, infrared cameras, road signage","People":"Drivers, wildlife conservation organizations","Owner":"Transport authorities, local governments"}]}
